summary: A Fleet Street barber recounts the story of Sweeney Todd, a notorious barber who in the last century murdered many customers for their money.
cast: Tod Slaughter|Stella Rho|John Singer|Eve Lister|Bruce Seton|D.J. Williams|Davina Craig|Jerry Verno|Graham Soutten|Billy Holland|Norman Pierce|Aubrey Mallalieu|Henry B. Longhurst|Ben Williams
title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
